id.title: Id
id.description: Unique id of the condition set rule

key.title: Key
key.description: A unique id by which Permit will identify this condition set rule.

user_set.title: User Set
user_set.description: the userset that is currently granted permissions, i.e: all the users matching this rule are granted the permission on the resourceset

permission.title: Permission
permission.description: a permission that is currently granted to the userset *on* the resourceset.

resource_set.title: Resource Set
resource_set.description: the resourceset that represents the resources that are currently granted for access, i.e: all the resources matching this rule can be accessed by the userset to perform the granted *permission*

organization_id.title: Organization Id
organization_id.description: Unique id of the organization that the condition set rule belongs to.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: Unique id of the project that the condition set rule belongs to.

environment_id.title: Environment Id
environment_id.description: Unique id of the environment that the condition set rule belongs to.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: Date and time when the condition set rule was created (ISO_8601 format).

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: Date and time when the condition set rule was last updated/modified (ISO_8601 format).
